data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Sergio Pena (Emmen) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 6, Anco Jansen is booked for the away team.
Sparta take a 1-0 lead thanks to Deroy Duarte.
Lennart Thy with an assist there.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
Goal! Miguel Araujo (Emmen) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 52, That's a fine assist from Michael de Leeuw.
Goal! Abdou Harroui gives Sparta a 2-1 lead in Rotterdam.
Adil Auassar instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Bryan Smeets with Mario Engels. This is the first substitution made today by Henk Fraser.
Marko Kolar is on a sub for Anco Jansen for Emmen.
Dick Lukkien is making the team's second substitution at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel with Donis Avdijaj replacing Nikolai Laursen.
In the minute 74, Henk Fraser (Sparta) is making a second substitution, with Aaron Meijers replacing Sven Mijnans.
Danzell Gravenberch is replacing Lennart Thy for Sparta at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
Lentini Caciano is replacing Sergio Pena for the away team.
In the minute 79, Hilal Ben Moussa (Emmen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
At Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel, Danzell Gravenberch has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Emmen make their fourth substitution with Lucas Bernadou replacing Hilal Ben Moussa.
In the minute 86, The away team have replaced Ricardo Van Rhijn with Nick Bakker. This is the fifth substitution made today by Dick Lukkien.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Henk Fraser is making the team's fourth substitution at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel with Tom Beugelsdijk replacing Deroy Duarte.
